nodes.text: Bureau of Sig, Spice and Slavery

The Bureau of Sig, Spice and Slavery, shortened to S3, was an intelligence and analysis law enforcement agency of the Galactic Republic that was formed centuries prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. S3 was responsible for the examination of weaponry, spice, and slaves that were recovered from arrests made by the Republic Security Force and traced their history to create a map of criminal records. As a result of corruption within the Galactic Senate, S3 suffered from a cut down in its staff members, budget, and facilities for decades.

The Bureau of Sig, Spice and Slavery was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
